about.title: About Ashyo
about.des: Ashyo was established in 2022 in Tashkent.

nasiya.title: Installment Plan
nasiya.des: Ashyo offers convenient online payment plans for all electronics.

paymentMethods.title: Payment Methods
paymentMethods.des: Pay conveniently in-store, via Click, or Payme.

garranty.title: Product Warranty
garranty.des: Learn everything about Ashyo's warranty and return policy.

help.title: Help
help.des: If you have any questions, feel free to ask.

AboutUs.des1: Ashyo - market-priced electronics and household appliances. Since its founding, it has been offering a wide range of products and reliable service.
AboutUs.des2: Ashyo was established in 2022 in Tashkent. Currently, it operates 26 stores in the capital and regions.
AboutUs.des3: You can purchase products through any convenient method: in-store or online. Installment plans are available for appliances. All you need to register is a passport.
AboutUs.des4: Legal entities can buy via bank transfer without additional fees.

Footer.questionPlaceholder: Ask the questions you're curious about
